Title: I Don't Want to Pay a Subscription To Program
Description:
One point I haven't explicitly heard in the great AI debate, though
it's been palpable, is the anxiety of having to be on the hook to pay a
subscription fee to write code.

Title: Jason Evans
Description: The jemalloc memory allocator was first conceived in early 2004, and hasbeen in public use for about 20 years now. Thanks to the nature of open source software licensing,jemalloc will remain publicly available indefinitely. But active upstream development has come to anend. This post briefly desc...
